bibl.title: Monks as Philosophers and Oracles in Late Antique Egypt.
bibl.note: Studies the monk's ability to act as an oracle from the story of the consultation of John of Lycopolis by Theodosius I and the letters of Antony the hermit. - Avec résumés en italien et en anglais.

bibl.title: Oracoli, visioni, profezie. L'Egitto da Alessandro il Grande all'Alto Medioevo. Oracles, Visions, Prophecies. Egypt from Alexander the Great to the Early Middle Ages

bibl.seg: Richard Westall, Monks as Philosophers and Oracles in Late Antique Egypt.

Oracoli, visioni, profezie. L'Egitto da Alessandro il Grande all'Alto Medioevo. Oracles, Visions, Prophecies. Egypt from Alexander the Great to the Early Middle Ages = SMSR 79 = N.S., 37 (2013) No. 1, pp. 103-122.
Studies the monk's ability to act as an oracle from the story of the consultation of John of Lycopolis by Theodosius I and the letters of Antony the hermit. - Avec résumés en italien et en anglais.
